lore: Diabolic Commanders are usually veterans of the Diabolic Horde that have emerged victorious in numerous battles over the years and lived long enough to tell their tales. Their authority over their squad is indisputable and their decisions are never questioned, though they are usually open to suggestions when it comes to designing a strategy or a battle plan. They are the only ones in contact with the Diabolic Bhuta, the Supreme Leader of the Horde that directs their operations from the shadows.
menagerieDialog: I'm tired of running around, everything hurts! Can't we rest for a little while?
What are we doing here? Let's get moving!
My hounds crave the flesh of humans. What do you say we go out and start a war to sate their appetites?
(It's busy feeding rotten meat to its pups.)
(It's having a difficult time controlling its beasts. What has them so anxious?)
name: Diabolic Commander
